item.title: Crossword Puzzle
item.description: Developed a Crossword Puzzle Generator in C, allowing user word inputs for puzzle creation. Implemented functionality to generate puzzles, solutions, and scrambled clues. Streamlined solving experience for users with seamless puzzle generation and solution presentation. NOTE. The above steps enable Unicode Standard emoji characters and sequences in Hugo, however the rendering of these glyphs depends on the browser and the platform. To style the emoji you can either use a third party emoji font or a font stack; e.
